actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain financial assistance to Haskell Indian Junior College, Lawrence, Kansas.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal assistance to Haskell Indian Junior College at Lawrence, Kansas, under the Higher Education Act of 1965 and under other Federal programs benefiting institutions of higher education.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain financial assistance to Haskell Indian Junior College, Lawrence, Kansas.
